author.name: char lie[26];
author.description: Un porteño en guayabera. Programador, traductor y pseudoDBA. Me compro de grande lo que no pude de niño. Language freak. Soporte en @2ndQuad_latam TJ/JW

author.name: Ashley Montanaro
author.description: Lecturer in Mathematics and EPSRC Early Career Research Fellow at the University of Bristol. Views my own and not always coherent.

author.name: Bristol Algorithms
author.description: We are the Algorithms team at the University of Bristol, UK. We study various aspects of the theory and practice of algorithms.
